ajito_aku_020_cassiopeia_01: I see you took care of the guards. Nice work.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_aku_020_cassiopeia_02:
Now, holed up in that base is Team Star’s Dark
crew—the Segin Squad.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_aku_020_cassiopeia_03:
Their boss, Giacomo, pretty much runs the whole
of Team Star, and he also produced that wild\r
soundtrack of theirs himself.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_aku_020_cassiopeia_04:
He’s a sharp guy. Even our declaration of war
won’t have ruffled him in the slightest.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_aku_020_cassiopeia_05:
His plan is probably to wear you down with a
wave of grunts, then finish you off himself.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_aku_020_cassiopeia_06:
No use trying to outthink strategic types like him.
Bring him down with a head-on attack![VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_aku_020_cassiopeia_07:
Just keep on defeating as many Pokémon as you
can until the big man himself shows up.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_aku_020_cassiopeia_09:
Ring the bell on the gates once you’re ready to
kick off this phase of the operation.\c
Time to wipe the Segin Squad off the map![VAR 0114(0009)]
